title: BLACK+DECKER dustbuster QuickClean Cordless Handheld Vacuum, Car Vacuum Portable (HNVC215B10)

top_reviews.title: Great power for suction
top_reviews.body: Works well,great power for suction,durable, charges quickly on charging port and hold power for a while.We use for car and garage area.Easy to use just press button and hold continuously and can vacuum.Great affordable pricing.Would highly recommend. Read more
